JavaLog.visitor
Class DereferenceVisitor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--JavaLog.visitor.Visitor
        |
        +--JavaLog.visitor.TransformerVisitor
              |
              +--JavaLog.visitor.DereferenceVisitor
public class DereferenceVisitor
extends TransformerVisitor

This class extends TransformerVisitor to dereference a Prolog estructure. A dereferenced structure does not contain variables. DereferenceVisitor traverses a prolog structure replacing each variable by it content.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $ProjectDate: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 17:11:12 -0300 $
